oop.ct1.superhero

Class SuperHero

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.ct1.superhero.SuperHero

  • public class SuperHero
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a superhero with attributes such as name, gender, and strength level.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_STRENGTH_LEVEL
